main event: Multiple UFO sightings reported over Chicago, Illinois, in 1952, including a hovering bright white circular object and radar detection of several unconventional aircraft.
interesting points: The bright white object was observed hovering for about 30 minutes before it accelerated and disappeared., A civilian pilot with 3500 hours of experience reported seeing a disc-shaped object traveling at estimated speeds of 400-600 knots., Radar crew detected 6 to 10 unconventional aircraft maneuvering at an altitude of 20,000 feet, showing behavior not consistent with known types., Witnesses described objects with a metallic appearance and high-speed movements., The reports were part of the Project Blue Book investigation into UFO activity.
sighted object: Unidentified flying objects described as circular, disc-shaped, and metallic in appearance.
witness description: Witnesses included civilian pilots and radar operating crew.
